statements: SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages;
SELECT encrypted_message, sender_id FROM encrypted_messages ORDER BY sender_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM encrypted_messages WHERE receiver_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 10 AND receiver_id = 20;
SELECT encrypted_message FROM encrypted_messages WHERE message_id = 100;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM encrypted_messages WHERE receiver_id = 30 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 40 AND receiver_id = 50 LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, encrypted_message FROM encrypted_messages WHERE sender_id = 60 OR receiver_id = 70;
SELECT * FROM Messages;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, encrypted_message FROM Messages WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, encrypted_message FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 100 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 5 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3;
SELECT m.message_id, u.username AS sender_username, u2.username AS receiver_username FROM Messages m JOIN Users u ON m.sender_id = u.user_id JOIN Users u2 ON m.receiver_id = u2.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE encrypted_message LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY message_id;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM sensitive_messages ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, message_id, user_id, timestamp FROM message_log WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT message_id, message_text, encryption_key FROM sensitive_messages WHERE message_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_messages
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM sensitive_messages WHERE message_id = 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM sensitive_messages JOIN message_log ON sensitive_messages.message_id = message_log.message_id
SELECT * FROM messages LIMIT 10;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, encrypted_message FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM messages ORDER BY sender_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 OR receiver_id = 4;
SELECT message_logs.date_time, messages.encrypted_message FROM message_logs INNER JOIN messages ON message_logs.message_id = messages.message_id ORDER BY message_logs.date_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT users.username, encryption_keys.encryption_key FROM users LEFT JOIN encryption_keys ON users.user_id = encryption_keys.user_id;
SELECT * FROM messages JOIN users ON messages.sender_id = users.user_id WHERE messages.sender_id != messages.receiver_id ORDER BY message_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM messages
SELECT sender, receiver, message_text FROM messages WHERE id = 1
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT contact_username, user_id FROM contacts
SELECT * FROM messages WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT receiver, message_text FROM messages WHERE id = 10;
SELECT sender, receiver, message_text FROM messages ORDER BY sender ASC, receiver DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM sessions JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.user_id WHERE session_id = 5;
